response.overview: A teen, Shawna (Kimmy Kimm), wants to move out and live on her own in another town, but her parent, Jesse (Sheena Ryder), insists she's still too young for that. Eventually, Jesse offers a compromise: Shawna can move out if she stays with her Uncle Nick (Kyle Mason). Shawna begrudgingly agrees to go stay with her uncle. However, when Shawna arrives on her Uncle Nick's doorstep, they start enthusiastically making out, revealing that this was their plan all along.  Tommy Pistol sets up some nanny cams around the house to keep an eye on the house cleaner. However, when Tommy uses his laptop to check the cams, he unexpectedly catches a tantalizing glimpse of his stepdaughter, Destiny Mira, wearing only a towel. As the days go by, Tommy continues to use the cams to catch Destiny in various states of undress, spying on her more and more. Catch as these hot babes fall Right Into Their Hands.
response.title: Right Into Their Hands
